list_definition.definition: the bowl-shaped mouth of a volcano

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The island is covered in volcanic craters.

list_definition.definition: a hollow made in the ground by a bomb etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The bombs left craters several yards wide and damaged nearby buildings.
